90115BOS01-d-01-15-89-ATK.Narrative: ON JANUARY 15, 1989, AMTRAK TRAIN 140'S EQUIPMENT WAS BEING WYED AND PPIED BACK INTO SPRINGFIELD STATION, ASSISTANT CONDUCTOR M. BEEBE WAS RIDING THE SIDE OF THE REAR CAR (BAGGAGE 1403) WHEN HE OBSERVED THE SWITCH WAS IMPROPERLY LINED FOR TRACK 6 INSTEAD OF TRACK 8. TRACK 6 WAS ALREADY OCCUPIED BY AMTRAK TRAIN 497'S EQUIPMENT . ASSISTANT CONDUCTOR BEEBE TRIED TO RADIO ENGINEER T. FORD, BUT IN THEPROCESS DROPPED HIS PORTABLE RADIO. ASSISTANT CONDUCTOR BEEBE DROPPED TO THE GROUND AND CLIMBED ABOARD COACH 21177 PULLING THE EMERGENCY CORD TO PREVENT COLLISION. HOWEVER, CONTACT WAS MADE WITH 497'SEQUIPMENT RESULTING IN THREE (3) COACHES DERAILING AND SUBSTANTIAL EQUIPMENT DAMAGE.NoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNone
